== Examples

=== Download files from Google Drive

This examples downloads all the files from Google Drive

[source,yaml]
----
pipeline:
  processors:
    - google_drive_search:
        query: "name = 'Test Doc'"
    - google_drive_download:
        file_id: "${!this.id}"
        mime_type: "${!this.mimeType}"
----
